mapper.select:
select hst.id as id, hst.htbah,hst.jflxdz as zl, hst.jf as cqr, hst.yf as gmr,wa.shrq as zxrq,wa.zxly,hst.iscancel as status from house_stock_trade hst left join wf_audit wa on hst.id=wa.projectid left join h t on hst.houseid=t.id left join ljz t1 on t.ljzh=t1.ljzh left join zrz t2 on t1.zrzh=t2.zrzh
left join project p on p.ID = t2.XMID left join ASSOCIATED_COMPANY ac on ac.ASSOCIATEDID=hst.id and ac.MODULENAME='stockTrade'
where hst.iscancel in (1,2) and wa.currentstatus=5
and (hst.htbah like '%'||#{htbah}||'%' )
and wa.shrq>=to_date(#{ksrq},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and wa.shrq<=to_date(#{jsrq},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ( p.COMPANY_ID in
#{item}
or ac.COMPANYID in
#{item}
or hst.DJR=#{userId} )
order by hst.SYS_UPD_DATE desc
mapper.update: update HOUSE_STOCK_TRADE t set t.CURRENTSTATUS = #{type} WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.select: update HOUSE_STOCK_TRADE t set t.HOUSEID = #{hid} where t.id=#{id}

select t2.xmmc ,t2.JZWMC,t1.mph zh,t.dymc dyh, t.ch,t.mph fh,hst.*,t1.zl from house_stock_trade hst left join h t on hst.houseid=t.id left join ljz t1 on t.ljzh=t1.ljzh left join zrz t2 on t1.zrzh=t2.zrzh where hst.id=#{id}
select h.id, h.zl, h.SCJZMJ, h.FWYT1, ljz.fwjg1 from house_stock_trade hst left join h on hst.houseid = h.id left join ljz on h.LJZH = ljz.LJZH where hst.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE house_stock_trade t set t.CURRENTSTATUS =1 where t.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t2.xmmc ,t2.JZWMC,t1.mph zh,t.dymc dyh, t.ch,t.mph fh,t.id as houseId,t1.id as ljzid from h t left join ljz t1 on t.ljzh=t1.ljzh left join zrz t2 on t1.zrzh=t2.zrzh where t.id=#{id}
